ShipEngine.Name: Thrusters
ShipEngine.Desc: Basic ion thrusters, for manoeuvering around a single planet or moon, but insufficient for interplanetary travel

ShipEngine.Name: Impulse Drive
ShipEngine.Desc: An impulse Drive, much faster than basic thrusters but still insufficient for interstellar travel. Can carry out small inter-planetary hops.

ShipEngine.Name: Fusion Drive
ShipEngine.Desc: A Fusion Drive, able to accelerate your craft to enormous speeds, making an entire solar system reachable with ease.

ShipEngine.Name: NearLight Drive
ShipEngine.Desc: A NearLight Drive, suitable for reaching the nearest stars.

ShipEngine.Name: SuperLight Drive
ShipEngine.Desc: A warp drive that can exceed the speed of light. Suitable for reaching the nearest stars.

ShipEngine.Name: Hyperspace Drive
ShipEngine.Desc: A Hyperspace Drive, able to traverse the distance between the stars extremely quickly and small enoguh to be fitted to a space ship.

ShipEngine.Name: Subspace Drive
ShipEngine.Desc: A Subspace Drive, slicing through the space between dimensions to travel between systems at extraordinary speed and small enoguh to be fitted to a space ship

ShipEngine.Name: Ethereal Drive
ShipEngine.Desc: An Ethereal Drive, using an improvement on subspace technology to travel even faster.
